channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#0260; 06:03AM; 1607 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44r21d7; Hollywood; FIRE NOW OUT: In 29 minutes, 52 firefighters extinguished a one story single family dwelling, well involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. 9-1-1 call received at 5:34AM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E61 E82 E97 EM14 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA41 RA803 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0082; 02:57AM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ldFWQ; Historic South-Central; Over 80 firefighters extinguished this Greater Alarm fire in one hour and 33 minutes with no injuries reported. There are hot spots and small pockets of fire remaining which will be held in check while the RS3 robotic firefighting vehicle is prepared for deployment and makes entry. The structural instability renders it unsafe for firefighters to complete extinguishment with an interior attack. LAFD Arson is on scene for the investigation, per protocol for a fire of this magnitude. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 BC706 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E33 E46 E66 EA1 EM1 HE1 RA15 RA46 RA803 RA846 RS3 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0082; 02:38AM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ldFWQ; Historic South-Central; With over 80 firefighters on scene (Greater Alarm status), this defensive operation is making progress but heavy fire remains in the structure. Due to visible signs of potential structural collapse on the North/East side (Alpha / Delta side) of the building, firefighters aren't able to target portions of the interior of the structure. Heavy equipment operators are enroute with the RS3 robotic firefighting vehicle to safely make entry. There are no injuries reported. LA DWP are enroute for high tension wires down. LAFD Arson is enroute (per protocol) for the investigation. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 BC706 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E33 E46 E66 EA1 EM1 HE1 RA15 RA46 RA803 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0082; 01:50AM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ldFWQ; Historic South-Central; This fire is at the Greater Alarm status and with heavy fire through the roof, is transitioning to the defensive mode. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC706 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E33 E46 E66 EM1 RA46 RA803 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0082; 01:24AM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ldFWQ; Historic South-Central; Two story, commercial building (100' x 75') with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources requested.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC706 E15 E215 E233 E46 E66 RA46 RA846 SQ21 T15 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1708; 10:30PM; 7125 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46umsaS; Chesterfield Square; One task force will handle an auto and rubbish fire exposing but not extending to the commercial building. All other resources (one task force was added) are canceled. No further details. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 SQ21 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1708; 10:21PM; 7125 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46umsaS; Chesterfield Square; One story (vacant) commercial building (50' x 100') with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 SQ21 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0251; 04:58AM; 8001 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NRQRZC; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters located, isolated and extinguished fire in the attic and fa√ßade of a two story strip mall in 30 minutes. There are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E289 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA77 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0251; 04:28AM; 8001 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NRQRZC; Sun Valley; Two story strip mall with smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and determined an outside fire extended into the attic of the building.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E289 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA77 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1653; 10:03PM; 6400 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SNWUV8; Van Nuys; Two car collision with a total of six patients (ages estimated): 60yo female determined dead on scene, 3yo male grave condition, 28yo female/21yo female/30yo male/22yo male all transported in *at least* serious condition. Any further media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 4755; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 E39 E83 E90 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA73 RA88 RA90 RA93 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
